alert.note: Alert for Bradford; Lackawanna; Northern Wayne; Pike; Southern Wayne; Susquehanna (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 17 at 11:02AM EST until January 17 at 5:00PM EST by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Snow showers with periods of heavy snow expected. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches. Total snow accumulations reported across New York counties is 6 to 8 inches. 3 to 6 inches reported across Pennsylvania with locally higher amounts at higher elevations. Winds expected to gust up to 25 mph. * WHERE...In Pennsylvania, Bradford, Susquehanna, Wayne, Lackawanna, and Pike counties. In New York, Chenango, Otsego, Broome and Delaware counties. * WHEN...Until 5 PM EST Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Some drier air has moved in from the west, reducing snow shower coverage. This is expected to be short lived westerly winds will bring in more moisture and increase snow shower coverage early this afternoon.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for New York can be found at 511ny.org, or by dialing 5 1 1 from within the state. The latest road conditions for Pennsylvania can be found at 511pa.com, or by dialing 5 1 1 from within the state.

area.areaDesc: Bradford; Lackawanna; Northern Wayne; Pike; Southern Wayne; Susquehanna
